about.title: About me
about.text: I am an Information Systems student and Full Stack developer with experience in academic, institutional, and personal projects. I focus on building modern, accessible, and well-structured web applications, valuing clean code, organization, and a consistent user experience. I like to understand the problem before writing code, aiming for simple, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

mindset.title: Mindset
mindset.text: I value clean code, organization, and best practices over quick but unsustainable solutions.

stack.title: Stack
stack.text: I have hands-on experience developing web applications using React and Node.js, as well as professional experience with PHP and Vue.js, working with REST APIs and relational databases, always focusing on clean, scalable, and well-structured code.

goal.title: Goal
goal.text: Continuously grow as a developer and work on projects that generate real impact.
